XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for core Mahara tables

FIELD.NAME: usr
FIELD.COMMENT: The User whose data are appended

FIELD.NAME: block
FIELD.COMMENT: the block that has been comitted

FIELD.NAME: view
FIELD.COMMENT: the view where the block resides

FIELD.NAME: url
FIELD.COMMENT: URL for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: username
FIELD.COMMENT: Username for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: Password for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: consumer
FIELD.COMMENT: OAuth Consumer Key for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: secret
FIELD.COMMENT: OAuth Secret for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: token
FIELD.COMMENT: Auth token for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: certificate
FIELD.COMMENT: Auth certificate for the web service call

FIELD.NAME: parameters
FIELD.COMMENT: Additional parameters for the web service call

INDEX.NAME: connectionk
INDEX.COMMENT: the connections can be repeated but the name must be unique for a given type and institution
